description: Bridges: Method `findOrCreateProductConcreteAvailabilityBySkuForStore()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `isProductSellableForStore()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
Bridges: Method `addInfoMessage()` must have `public function create<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer` signature.
